files.patch:
@@ -24,0 +24,8 @@
+    - name: '[Windows] Install Cygwin'
+      if: runner.os == 'Windows'
+      uses: cygwin/cygwin-install-action@v2
+
+    - name: '[Windows] Configure Git'
+      if: runner.os == 'Windows'
+      run: git config --global core.autocrlf input
+
@@ -34,4 +42,0 @@
-       
-    - name: 'Install Cygwin on Windows'
-      if: runner.os == 'Windows'
-      uses: cygwin/cygwin-install-action@v2
